description: This Kotlin source file defines several network repository classes for a mobile application, handling API interactions for content, metadata, assets, and ratings with fallback defaults and error handling.

classes.name: NetworkContentRepository
classes.description: Repository for fetching content info and home sections via API with safe fallbacks.

classes.name: NetworkMetadataRepository
classes.description: Repository for fetching metadata such as indices and rating settings with default fallbacks.

classes.name: NetworkAssetsRepository
classes.description: Repository for fetching asset-related data, such as instruction images, with fallback defaults.

classes.name: NetworkRatingRepository
classes.description: Repository for managing like/rating state related to content.

methods.name: getHomeSections
methods.description: Fetches list of home section identifiers, with default list fallback.

methods.name: getContentInfo
methods.description: Fetches detailed content information for a given content ID.

methods.name: getIndiceCopy
methods.description: Fetches an IndiceCopy object, fallback to defaults stored in resources.

methods.name: getVodRatingSettings
methods.description: Fetches video-on-demand rating settings with defaults.

methods.name: getInstructionImages
methods.description: Returns instruction images, with safe defaults on failure.

methods.name: hasRated
methods.description: Checks if content has been rated/liked by the user.

methods.name: setRated
methods.description: Sets the rated state of a content item (no-op implementation).

methods.name: isLiked
methods.description: Checks if the content is liked.

methods.name: setLike
methods.description: Sets the liked state for content.
